A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
By far the worst SW film of all time. Critics should be ashamed of themselves. They are either in Disney's pocket or are out of touch with reality.

Either way\, the bad writing\, the inconsistencies introduced into the SW mythos\, the exceptional disrespect to the original SW characters\, the SJW politics and the refusal to acknowledge any fan feedback cannot be ignored simply because "the film wanted to risks".

I wanted to love the new series\, I really did\, but that is the last SW Disney film I will support\, and I will do everything in my power to influence others to skip any future films.
